addRune(string,string,string,uint8,uint2.details: We assign tokenId to a supported Rune

params._relay: Bitcoin bridge address which validates Bitcoin tx
params._startingBlockNumber: Requests included in a block older than _startingBlockNumber cannot be processed
params._treasury: Address of treasury that collects protocol fees

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setExchangeConnector(uint256,address).details: If address(0) is set for an appId, that appId is inactive

setRewardDistributor(address).details: This contract distributes locker fee between locker and stakers

setUnwrapFee(uint256).details: This fee is taken for unwrap requests to cover the Bitcoin network fee

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unwrapRune(uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes.details: For unwrap requests (not swap & unwrap), pass _appId,      _inputAmount and _path ZERO

params._amount: of WRune that user wants to burn

wrapRune(bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,uint2.details: Locker submits wrap requests to this function for:      1) Checking tx inclusion      2) Extracting wrap request info from the OP_RETURN output      3) Exchanging wrapped Rune (if request is wrap & exchange) using the path         provided by the locker

FailedRuneWrapAndSwap(address,uint256,ad.notice: Emit when a wrap&swap request is processed but swap failed

NewRuneSwapAndUnwrap(address,bytes,uint8.notice: Emit when a new rune swap&unwrap request is created

NewRuneUnwrap(address,bytes,uint8,addres.notice: Emit when a new rune unwrap request is created

NewRuneWrap(address,uint256,address,(uin.notice: Emit when a rune wrap request is processed

NewRuneWrapAndSwap(address,uint256,addre.notice: Emit when a wrap&swap request is processed

SetExchangeConnector(uint256,address).notice: Emits when appId for an exchange connector is set

ThirdPartyInfoUpdated(uint256,address,ui.notice: Emit when third party fee updated

UnwrapRuneProcessed(address,uint256,byte.notice: Emit when a unwrap request is processed

isUnwrapRequestProcessed(uint256).notice: Check if the unwrap request has been processed before

isWrapRequestProcessed(bytes32).notice: Check if the wrap request has been processed before

removeRune(uint256).notice: Remove support of a wrapped RUNE token

setThirdParty(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Setter for third party address and fee
